Detailed Description

Used for requests to untrusted endpoints that may potentially be malicious.

Member Function Documentation

static HttpWebRequest Aurora.Framework.UntrustedHttpWebRequest.Create ( Uri  uri  )  [static]

Creates an HttpWebRequest that is hardened against malicious endpoints after ensuring the given Uri is safe to retrieve.

Parameters:
uri Web location to request
Returns:
A hardened HttpWebRequest if the uri was determined to be safe
Exceptions:
ArgumentNullException If uri is null
ArgumentException If uri is unsafe
static HttpWebRequest Aurora.Framework.UntrustedHttpWebRequest.Create ( Uri  uri,
bool  allowLoopback,
int  readWriteTimeoutMS,
int  timeoutMS,
int  maximumRedirects 
) [static]

Creates an HttpWebRequest that is hardened against malicious endpoints after ensuring the given Uri is safe to retrieve.

Parameters:
uri Web location to request
allowLoopback True to allow connections to localhost, otherwise false
readWriteTimeoutMS Read write timeout, in milliseconds
timeoutMS Connection timeout, in milliseconds
maximumRedirects Maximum number of allowed redirects
Returns:
A hardened HttpWebRequest if the uri was determined to be safe
Exceptions:
ArgumentNullException If uri is null
ArgumentException If uri is unsafe
